statements: SELECT * FROM sales_records ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM sales_records WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM sales_records WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_records WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT id, product_name, sale_date FROM sales_records WHERE unit_price < 40 ORDER BY sale_date
SELECT * FROM sales_records WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_records GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity_sold > 100
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM sales_records ORDER BY product_name
SELECT AVG(unit_price) AS avg_price, MAX(unit_price) AS max_price, MIN(unit_price) AS min_price FROM sales_records
SELECT id, product_name, unit_price FROM sales_records WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT sale_id, total_price, sale_date FROM sales ORDER BY sale_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type='Credit';
SELECT transaction_id, description, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type='Debit';
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(total_price) AS total_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'Expense' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_type, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING AVG(amount) > 5000;
SELECT sale_date, SUM(unit_price*quantity) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY sale_date ORDER BY sale_date;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, amount FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT transaction_date, amount, description FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_id FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 100
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 AND supplier_id = 2;
SELECT sale_date, amount FROM sales JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT description FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%refund%' OR description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_location FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM FinancialTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT farmer_name, farmer_location FROM Farmers;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, sale_quantity FROM Sales JOIN Products ON Sales.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0;

SELECT farmer_name, product_name, sale_quantity, transaction_amount FROM Farmers JOIN Sales ON Farmers.farmer_id = Sales.product_id JOIN FinancialTransactions ON Sales.sale_id = FinancialTransactions.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE expiration_date > CURDATE();
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT s.*, p.product_name, p.price FROM Sales s JOIN Products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 10;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.sale_date, t.transaction_date FROM Customers c JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN Sales s ON t.sales_id = s.sales_id WHERE s.quantity >= 5;
SELECT p.product_name, SUM(s.quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM Products p JOIN Sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT s.sales_id, s.product_id, p.product_name, c.customer_name FROM Sales s JOIN Products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id JOIN Customers c ON s.sales_id = c.customer_id;
